10-4 | blank_info_sec2 = UP15 | website = www.loda.gov.ua | footnotes = }} Lviv Oblast () is an oblast (province) of western Ukraine. The administrative centre is Lviv. The population of Lviv Oblast was 2,537,000 in 2013. ==References==
